lyrics.text:
‘Oku mo’ui hoku ‘Eiki,
‘Oku ou ‘ilo pau ki ai;
Pea ka hoko hono taimi
Te Ne hā’ele ki māmani.

Pea neongo ‘oku mohe
Hoku kakano ‘i fa’itoka,
Efu ‘a e sino ni, ‘o mole;
Ka teu mātā hono fofonga.

Mātā ‘e hoku mata ni,
‘O ‘ikai ha taha kehe,
‘O sio hono langilangi
‘E au naʻe koto kelekele.

‘Oku ou fu’u ongo’i ē
‘A e ivi te u mo’ui ai;
‘Afio mai ‘a e Laumālie
Ko hoku faka’amanak
i
.

Toki fo’ou pe ‘a e mo’ui,
Mole ‘a e kovi fulipē;
Pea kakato ‘a e huhu’i
He sino, loto, laumālie.
